        public void autoCommit​(java.lang.String aID,
                       boolean mode)
        autoCommit(dbName) effective only in case of disconnect, close, etc.
        Parameters:
        aID - String, the Agent ID.
        mode - boolean, true: autoCommit, false: reset autoCommit.

      • lock

        public boolean lock​(java.lang.String dbName,
                    java.lang.String key)
        lock() lock key. Must be invoked before delete or update.
        By delete: locked key is released if delete was successful
        Parameters:
        dbName - String, the DB name.
        key - String, key name
        Returns:
        boolean true: key is locked, false if unknown key or key was locked
